awd_titl_txt: Assessing the Progression and Fire Behavior of the October  20, 1991, Oakland Hills Fire
awd_abstract_narration: The purpose of this project is to                                               study and document the progression                                              and fire behavior, from inception                                               to containment, of the now called                                               "Tunnel" Fire that occurred in the                                              Oakland Hills in late 1991.  It                                                 will involve basic combustion and                                               heat transfer fundamentals,                                                     vegetational and structural                                                     analysis, and a concise overview                                                incorporating all existing records.                                             The issues to be addressed are                                                  concerned with:  a) the response of                                             domestic and wildland vegetation to                                             weather and climate such as drought                                             and wind, b) the heat transfer                                                  processes occurring during the                                                  fire, and c) the interaction of                                                 structural and vegetational fuels                                               in fire.  The results of the                                                    research will be useful in                                                      evaluating the hazards in the                                                   urban/wildland interface, the                                                   effects on these areas, vis a vis                                               the fire risk, of extreme climatic                                              and weather events, and the                                                     potential effectiveness of                                                      mitigation measures being proposed.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
